summary:
Tweak of Jaysus Swords. Fixed an issue with light reflection. (if you don\'t have that problem, or don\'t want to change the look, don\'t worry about downloading this mod)
REQUIRES JaySuS Swords.
descriptionHtml:
This is a Tweaking of the weapons by JaySus to make them look/appear more \'gritty\' (for those who want that) and reflect less light (for anyone having the same issue I had) 
Otherwise this is for anyone who prefers these over the originals.

---------------------------------------------------------
REQUIRES: [url=file.php?id=1002]JaySuS Swords[/url]
---------------------------------------------------------


Currently modified Weapons(v2.0):

[color=\"#FF0000\"][u][b]ALL - (JaySuS v11B)[/b][/u][/color]
- Nordic Axe
- Woodsman\'s Axe
- Crude Axe
- Fine Norse Axe(s)
- Shiavonna
- Hunting Knife
- Crusader Sword
- Smallsword
- Nordic Blade
- Boarding Blade
- Azurbrand
- Gungnir
- Albensword
- Hunting Sword(s)
- Fine Bastard Sword
- Ancient Nordic Sword
- Nordic Blade
- Dragonbrand
- Knight\'s Sword
- Khajiit Saber
- Akavirii Sword
- Knight\'s Greatsword
- Fine Iron Sword
- Fine Crusader Sword
- Dragonsting Sword/Dagger
- Fine Bastard Sword
- Argonian Blade/Battlesaber
- Blade of Dibella

----------------------------------------
[color=\"#8B0000\"][u][b]Optional:[/b][/u][/color]
----------------------------------------
-- I kinda liked the Dibella blade as it was, shiny like the Diblella statues; so I put up a version (labeled 2.1) where the Blade of Dibella was left unedited.

-- I wanted the dragonbone sword to match closer to the color of the dragonbone armor, so I put an optional file up for that as well.


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Will Stay Up to date with JaySuS Swords, so check back after JaySuS updates.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if any bugs are noticed, let me know by posting in the comments section of this mod, and I\'ll work to get it fixed ASAP.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[u]Installation:[/u]  (make sure JaySuS Swords is installed first)

Option 1: Nexus Mod Manager (reccomended)
- Download with NMM
- Double-click on the mod
- click \"yes to all\" when it asks to overwrite


Option 2: Manual
- Extract the \'textures\' folder into the Skyrim \'Data\' folder
- Merge and Overwrite all files.

--------------------------------------------------------


[u]Uninstall:[/u]
-Disable through NMM by double-clicking
OR
-Delete the files placed in the jaysus textures location.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*done with permission from Jaysus. Gotta thank him for some awesome weapons!
author: xeightballx
